Scenes.Text: Search the first area for the ~r~suspect~w~.
No suspect found, move to the ~g~second location~w~.
Now search for the ~r~suspect~w~ in the second ~g~area~w~. He ~r~has to~w~ be there!

Outcomes.Dialogue: ~r~Suspect~w~: Oh my god, police! Don't shoot! I surrender!
~r~Suspect~w~: Oh shit, the cops! Fu** you, I'll ~o~blow~w~ your ~o~head off~w~, stupid pigs!
~y~You~w~: Dispatch, Suspect found, gonna be a ~o~pursuit~w~!
